revision.comment: /* top */ clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Single-board Computer |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://wiki.radxa.com/RockpiS |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Radxa |model = Rock Pi |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = S |revision = v13 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = D4WPN8 |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Rockchip;RK3308; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A35 |cpu1spd = 1.3 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Maker Founder;MKDV8G1L-AS; |flash1size = 1 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TQ4G63EFR-RDC; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8201F; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 76:51:62 |oui = 00:E0:4C
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2017.09; |stockos = Linux;4.4.153-55;Debian 10;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, Micro SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_poe_type = af |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = USB Female Type-C
|serial = yes,, 3.3V TTL,, (1500000 8N1),, via 26-pin header |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, Bluetooth 4.2, I2S, I2C, SPI, GPIO, PoE Expansion header, |addchip = 5.5V, 2A Low Loss Power Distribution Switch;Silergy Corp;SY6280;;1;,,, 2A, 1MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator;Silergy Corp;SY8089;;1;,,, 1A, 1.5MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator;Silergy Corp;SY8088;;3;,,, High-PSRR 500mA LDO;Powtech;PT5108;;1; |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = rock |defaultpass = rock |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Radxa Limited |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Armbian, Slackware,
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = 24 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = <!-- Radio module name, optional link, Leave blank for none --> |rad1modif = SDIO 2.0 |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8723DS; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The [https://wiki.radxa.com/ROCKPI_S_PoE_HAT RockPi S PoE HAT] (or a similar product) is required for PoE support.
{{see also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Rockchip]]'' RK3308 Quad-core Cortex-A35 *Memory: 512MB (SDRAM) DDR3 *Onboard Storage: 1 GiB SD NAND Flash, TF card (max. 128GB) / MMC card slot *WiFi & BT: [[Realtek]] RTL8723DS Bluetooth 4.2 *Network: 1x Fast Ethernet w/ Optional PoE *USB: 1 USB 2.0 *GPIO: 2x 26-pin Headers *Power Source: 5V/2A via USB Type-C
==Links of Interest== *[http://linuxgizmos.com/radxa-updates-rock-pi-4-with-nvme-and-debuts-poe-hat-and-a-tiny-rk3308-based-voice-board/ ''Radxa a tiny RK3308-based voice board'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://liliputing.com/2019/10/rock-pi-s-is-a-1-7-inch-square-quad-core-computer-priced-at-10-and-up.html ''Rock Pi S is a 1.7 inch square, quad-core computer'' on '''Liliputing'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2019/06/19/rock-pi-s-tiny-sbc-rockchip-rk3308-processor/ ''$9.9 ROCK Pi S is a Tiny SBC Powered by Rockchip RK3308 Processor'' on '''CNXSOFT''' ]
